1333720.name: From Hell
1333720.description:
Explore an ancient manor in the late 1960s when your old friend sends you a letter asking for help. Join me on a journey into the darkness where every encounter could be your last. With each step you discovering secret of your friend, an archaeologist, discovered in the darkest hours of his life. Collect and use weapons, items and explore a partially nonlinear map. Fight ghouls and all kinds of monsters which emerged from the dark depths of the mythical underworld and try to stay alive. Use the secrets of the extinct mystical blue plant of ancient Egypt, craft items and powerful ammo, solve puzzles and unlock secrets in the hunt for secret of your missing old friend.

From Hell is a third-person action survival horror game inspired by action survival games from the 90s developed on Unreal Engine 5.

***********

Tips:

  • When you oppening the door, press interaction again and you will kick it

  • Weapons have aditional damage to ammo and when are fully aimed, there is another additional damage

  • Enemy have per bone damage + weakspots. Steadily aiming for the head is most effective.

  • Player can jump higher, when run. But both drain stamina.

**********
